sentences.en: A speculator may try to amass great wealth.
sentences.cn: 投机商会想方设法积聚钱财.

sentences.en: After teching up, amass Avatars with Venoms cover.
sentences.cn: 在攀科技以后, 大量暴圣灵并用毒液保护.

sentences.en: And, Israel continues to amass ground troops around Gaza in preparation for a possible ground offensive.
sentences.cn: 另外, 以色列继续在加沙周边地区集结地面部队,为可能发动地面进攻做准备.

sentences.en: For 25 years, Darwin amassed evidence to support his theories.
sentences.cn: 25年间，达尔文收集了大量证据来支持自己的理论。

sentences.en: Given today's crisis, the incentives to amass reserves have only grown.
sentences.cn: 当今危机形势更加刺激了外汇储备的积累.

sentences.en: He amassed a fortune after the war.
sentences.cn: 战后，他积累了大量财富。

sentences.en: He is planning to amass a fortune for a rainy day.
sentences.cn: 他正打算积蓄财富以备不时之需.

sentences.en: Mr. Smith's business was very successful, and he was able to amass a fortune.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生的事业极为成功, 所以他积聚了一大笔财富.

sentences.en: My dream is to amass one million coffee mugs.
sentences.cn: 我的梦想是收集一百万个咖啡杯子.

sentences.en: People tend to amass possessions, sometimes without being aware of doing so.
sentences.cn: 人们倾向于积攒东西, 有的并未意识到这样做.

sentences.en: Scientists are continuing to amass data concerning the effects of many other types of toxic pollutants.
sentences.cn: 科学家正在继续积累有关其他类型有害污染物影响和危害的数据资料.

sentences.en: Since then, we have also started to amass genome data from A . alternata.
sentences.cn: 从那以后, 我们又收集了大量有关甘蓝格链孢菌素A基因组的资料.

sentences.en: The capitalists amass great wealth by exploiting workers.
sentences.cn: 资本家剥削工人而积累了巨额财富.

sentences.en: The player to amass the highest number of points wins.
They amass enough evidence to convict him on six charges.
sentences.cn: 他们搜集了足够的证据,宣判他有六条罪状.

sentences.en: When are teched up, just amass Avatars and go straight at your opponent.
sentences.cn: 当你攀科技以后, 只要造大量圣灵然后径直攻向你的对手就可以了.

trans.tran_en: if you amass money, knowledge, information etc, you gradually collect a large amount of it
if you amass money, knowledge, information etc, you gradually collect a large amount of it
